Package ohos.agp.transition

Class TransitionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.transition.Transition
      • ohos.agp.transition.TransitionGroup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TransitionDefault

    public class TransitionGroup
extends Transition
    Implements a transition group, which includes one or more transition effects that can be played sequentially or simultaneously. Typical transition effects include TransitionZoomingMove.
    Since:
    7

    • Method Detail

      • setSequence

        public void setSequence​(int sequence)
        Sets the playback sequence of the transition effects in this transition group.
        Parameters:
        sequence - Indicates the playback sequence to set. The value 0 means that the transition effects are played simultaneously, and 1 means that they are played sequentially.
        Since:
        7

      • addTransition

        public void addTransition​(Transition transition)
        Adds a transition effect.
        Parameters:
        transition - Indicates the transition effect to add.
        Since:
        7

      • removeTransition

        public void removeTransition​(Transition transition)
        Removes a transition effect.
        Parameters:
        transition - Indicates the transition effect to remove.
        Since:
        7

      • precludeElement

        public void precludeElement​(int id,
                            boolean preclude)
        Precludes a component or restores a precluded component.
        Parameters:
        id - Indicates the component ID.
        preclude - Specifies whether to preclude or restore the component. The value true means to preclude the component, and false means to restore the component.
        Since:
        7
